t: I do not have an Amazon Ads account. Can I still use Amazon Ads on Canva?
Canva
s: Yes, you can access Amazon Ads on Canva by signing in with your Amazon.com⁠(opens in a new tab or window) account. This will give you access to guest mode where you can check your design against Amazon Ads guidelines.
